com.docker.domain.gameobject

Class Train

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.docker.domain.gameobject.Train

  • public class Train
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
    The train trasports the container of the game. it knows all the container positions and updates them
